about_me.des: I am PHP programmer since 2008 , with experience in a lot of PHP frameworks with Advanced Degree knowledge in language and different libraries html5, css3 and javascript what convertirdo me in Full Stack. I keep constantly learning , I think a day without learning something new is a lost day , that entails that every day has new challenges , I have flexibility in working my way I have adapted over the years a lot of companies I like to travel , this is my blog, where I will share different experiences and tricks throughout my years as a programmer / entrepreneur.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
